chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Davram t'Ghaline Bashere, p. 14—Lord of Bashere, Tyr, and Sidonia; Guardian of the Blightborder; Defender of the Heartland; Marshal-General to Queen Tenobia of Saldaea; and her uncle. He is also Faile's father. He is one of the best military commanders in the World, in such company as Gareth Bryne, Agelmar Jagad, Pedron Niall, and Rodel Ituralde. See also t'Aybara, Faile ni Bashere; Bashere, Zarine.
